ProcessTemplates.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento to Zoho CRM - Customers
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template will retrieve customer data from Adobe Commerce / Magento, map them to Zoho CRM format and import them to Zoho CRM as contacts.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"MagentoBaseUrl":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The base domain for Magento."},"MagentoUser":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The username for Magento."},"MagentoPassword":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The password for Magento."},"ZohoAccountUrl":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional account domain for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoRefreshToken":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The Zoho refresh token, which is used to authorize access to Zoho CRM API."},"ZohoApiUrl":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional API domain for Zoho CRM."}}

Process.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento to Zoho CRM - Customers
Process.Description: This template will retrieve customer data from Adobe Commerce / Magento, map them to Zoho CRM format and import them to Zoho CRM as contacts.
